channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 16 Buzz: Jets 'Mutually' Part Ways With Former Packers Receiver
item.description: We're down to the final three weeks of the 2025 NFL regular season, with each bit of news across the league becoming more and more critical.

item.title: Favorite 'Dogs: Back Hurricanes in CFP First Round, Titans at Chiefs
item.description: Will Hill thinks Miami has found its form entering the CFP, and that the Titans could surprise a listless Chiefs team. See his best underdog bets.

item.title: 2025 NFL Division Winner Odds: Crucial Week 16 Games Set to Impact Races
item.description: A few crucial Week 16 contests could impact division races, and potentially, playoff seeding. See the latest odds.

item.title: 2026 NFL Draft No. 1 Pick Odds: Fernando Mendoza Clear Favorite, Arch off Board
item.description: Now that Arch Manning is off the board, here are the latest odds for the No. 1 pick in the 2026 NFL Draft.

item.title: Paris Court Rules PSG Must Pay Over $70 Million to Kylian Mbappe in Unpaid Wages
item.description: A Paris labor court ruled Paris Saint-Germain must pay over 60 million euros to Kylian Mbappe in a dispute over unpaid wages.

item.title: Inside the ugly Chris Paul-Clippers divorce -- and a season on the brink of disaster
item.description: A future Hall of Famer at the end of his career, looking for one final ride. Here's why the Chris Paul-Clippers reunion was doomed.

item.title: Updated contract projections for the top four free agent hitters
item.description: Pete Alonso and Kyle Schwarber got big bucks for their ability to hit big flies. Here's why it could bring bigger paydays to other available hitters.

item.title: No more Nimmo, Timmy Trumpet and their all-time HR king: Remaking the Mets
item.description: David Stearns' vision for turning things around at Citi Field hasn't been a hit with fans so far. What's next?

item.title: Tempo reveal new uniforms ahead of inaugural season
item.description: The new Toronto WNBA franchise revealed its fresh look heading into its inaugural season.

item.title: Aaron Rodgers, Steelers snap Dolphins' four-game win streak
item.description: Here's what to know from the Steelers' win over the Dolphins on Monday night.
